list.name: Changes
list.comment: Add discount logic to `consulta.js` to calculate total cost with insurance discounts.

task.summary: Default task

- Remove duplicate "Consultar Costos" button and replace broken "Agendar cita" button - Fix admin login functionality with input validation and redirect logic - Add IntelliJ project configurations to .idea directory - Document resolved and pending issues in `problemas.md` - Update database connection settings in `db.js`
Add "start" script to backend/package.json
- Document resolved issues for `medicos_disponibles.html` and add pending problems - Update database connection to accept SSL

- Implement service selector, cost calculation, and medico schedule filtering in `consultar_costos.html` - Add backend routes for fetching medico schedules and filtering by specialty - Update frontend logic for services display and dynamic cost calculation - Document resolved issues for `consultar_costos.html` in `problemas.md`
Add "Volver" button to `registro_asistencia.html`, update styles, and document resolved issue in `problemas.md`
Document resolved issue in `problemas.md`
Refactor event listeners in `consultar_costos.js` for improved code organization and readability.

- Add consultation selector and total cost calculation in `registro_asistencia.html` - Update backend route for pending consultations with detailed cost breakdown - Implement dynamic consultation data loading in `registro_asistencia.js` - Document resolved and pending issues for `registro_asistencia.html` in `problemas.md`
Add consultation cost update functionality in `cambiar_costos.html` with backend integration and dynamic data loading

- Add `ajustar_convenios.js` to handle convenio adjustments and integrate with backend - Implement backend route `aseguradora.js` for convenio retrieval and updates - Link `ajustar_convenios.js` in `ajustar_convenios.html` - Document resolved issues for `ajustar_convenios.html` in `problemas.md`

- Replace static content in `servicios_disponibles.html` with dynamic data loading via `servicios_disponibles.js` - Add backend route `/medicos/ocupado` for fetching unavailable doctors - Document resolved issues in `problemas.md`
Add click event for `buscarPacienteBtn` in `citas_registradas.js` and document resolved issue in `problemas.md`
Add dynamic data loading for monthly incomes in `consolidado.html` with `consolidado.js` integration, backend route `/ingresos/mensuales`, and document resolved issues in `problemas.md`.
Remove `problemas.md` as resolved and pending issues are now tracked in commit messages and other project documentation.
Fix typo in `servicios_disponibles.js` (replace `dataStyle` with `dateStyle` in time formatting options).
Fix typo in `servicios_disponibles.js` (replace `dataStyle` with `dateStyle` in time formatting options).
Update `medicos_disponibles.js` to include data from unavailable doctors and adjust DOM element references.
Fix `registro_asistencia.js` to correctly identify consultations by converting `idconsulta` to string for comparison.
Add discount logic to `consulta.js` to calculate total cost with insurance discounts.

MESSAGE.value: Add project configuration files and update database connection details

- Removed duplicate "Consultar Costos" button in `index.html`. - Fixed Admin login functionality in `index.html` by adding validation script. - Updated `.idea` configuration files for project setup and added `.gitignore`. - Documented resolved issues in `problemas.md`. - Updated database connection details in `db.js`.

- Remove duplicate "Consultar Costos" button and replace broken "Agendar cita" button - Fix admin login functionality with input validation and redirect logic - Add IntelliJ project configurations to .idea directory - Document resolved and pending issues in `problemas.md` - Update database connection settings in `db.js`
Add "start" script to backend/package.json
- Update SSL settings in `db.js` and document resolved issue with `select` in `problemas.md`
- Document resolved issues for `medicos_disponibles.html` and add pending problems - Update database connection to accept SSL

- Implement service selector, cost calculation, and medico schedule filtering in `consultar_costos.html` - Add backend routes for fetching medico schedules and filtering by specialty - Update frontend logic for services display and dynamic cost calculation - Document resolved issues for `consultar_costos.html` in `problemas.md`
Add "Volver" button to `registro_asistencia.html`, update styles, and document resolved issue in `problemas.md`
Document resolved issue in `problemas.md`
Add hidden "Selecciona la consulta" dropdown to `registro_asistencia.html` for future functionality
Add hidden "Selecciona la consulta" dropdown to `registro_asistencia.html`
Refactor event listeners in `consultar_costos.js` for improved code organization and readability.

- Add consultation selector and total cost calculation in `registro_asistencia.html` - Update backend route for pending consultations with detailed cost breakdown - Implement dynamic consultation data loading in `registro_asistencia.js` - Document resolved and pending issues for `registro_asistencia.html` in `problemas.md`
Add consultation cost update functionality in `cambiar_costos.html` with backend integration and dynamic data loading

- Add `ajustar_convenios.js` to handle convenio adjustments and integrate with backend - Implement backend route `aseguradora.js` for convenio retrieval and updates - Link `ajustar_convenios.js` in `ajustar_convenios.html` - Document resolved issues for `ajustar_convenios.html` in `problemas.md`

- Replace static content in `servicios_disponibles.html` with dynamic data loading via `servicios_disponibles.js` - Add backend route `/medicos/ocupado` for fetching unavailable doctors - Document resolved issues in `problemas.md`
Add click event for `buscarPacienteBtn` in `citas_registradas.js` and document resolved issue in `problemas.md`
Add dynamic data loading for monthly incomes in `consolidado.html` with `consolidado.js` integration, backend route `/ingresos/mensuales`, and document resolved issues in `problemas.md`.
Remove `problemas.md` as resolved and pending issues are now tracked in commit messages and other project documentation.
Fix typo in `servicios_disponibles.js` (replace `dataStyle` with `dateStyle` in time formatting options).
Update `medicos_disponibles.js` to include data from unavailable doctors and adjust DOM element references.
Fix `registro_asistencia.js` to correctly identify consultations by converting `idconsulta` to string for comparison.
Add discount logic to `consulta.js` to calculate total cost with insurance discounts.
